item.description:
THE PROFESSIONALS NETWORK ORGANIZATION

in association with

The All New "Professionals Network Organization Meetup USA Group" (a div of The Professionals Network Organization) &


  • The New York City Black Single Professionals
  • Black Singles Magazine
  • Black Organizers & Meeting Planners Group
  • The Phenomenal Women Group
  • The New York City Black Professionals Meetup Group
  • Black Writers Guild of America
  • The Restaurant Owners Meetup
  • Renaissance Man Magazine
  • The Power Networking Series


invite you, your friends, colleagues and family to join us as we invade

T R I B E C A
for our
SUPER BOWL SUNDAY PROFESSIONAL NETWORK JAM !!!!

Sunday - Feb 3, 2008
@
Tribeca's Best Kept Secret
Corio
337 West Broadway @ Grand St
NY, NY

Doors Open: 5pm- Until
21 & Older

Kick OFF Toast !!!
Admission: Free
Wear Your Best Team Colors and Team Jersey !!!!!!!!
Complimentary Appetizers
Cash Bar (2 for 1 Drink Specials)
Large Video Screen (Main Floor)
Flat Screen (bottom Level)
Card Games
Wear Your Best Team Colors and Jersey

Come Network with Old Friends and Make New Ones!!!

Hosted by:

Tony Herbert (Chairman/The Professionals Network Org)
Mark Anthony Jenkins (Publisher/Black Singles Magazine)
Michelle Mitchell (Founder/The Phenomenal Women Group)
Marvin Mitchell (Organizer/ NYC Black Professional Meetup Group)
Chris Salandy (President/CS Concepts)
Brenda Jeanne Wyche (President/The Phenomenal Women Group - New York)
Phil Andrews (President/Power Networking Series)
Desmond Wilder/Deangelo James (Publishers/Renaissance Man Magazine)

Music by: DJ Tall Guy
(Spinning the best of House, Reggae, R&B, Salsa, Merengue, & Ol' Skool)

SEE YOU THERE!!

www.myspace.com/tpno

SUPER BOWL SUNDAY PROFESSIONAL NETW?
item.name: SUPER BOWL SUNDAY PROFESSIONAL NETWORK JAM...
